name: CryRoom
description:
In the CryRoom you will need to look for a passage to new rooms by opening doors and looking for keys to them.
*There are no visual screamers in the game.

Controls:

AWSD - movement
E - Pick up things, open doors and activate mechanism
F - Use the key for the door if it is locked
CTRL - sit down
SHIFT - sprint

**Made on the basis of the plugin "Horror Engine"
